Is there a way to see coordinates onscreen? I'd like to be able to see them at all times, even when on EVA with a kerbal.

Edited July 27, 2013 by Jodo42

If you are landed, you can see your coordinates in map view by hovering over your craft, or you can press the info button on the right side of the screen in map view. If you aren't landed, you can press Alt+F12 and click "Show Flight Debug Stats", and the latitude and longitude will show up in the top right.

If you are landed, you can see your coordinates in map view by hovering over your craft, or you can press the info button on the right side of the screen in map view. If you aren't landed, you can press Alt+F12 and click "Show Flight Debug Stats", and the latitude and longitude will show up in the top right.

Thanks very much!
